s0187.literal: Appraisal says: Confucius said 'These people are the reason the Three Dynasties followed the straight path,' truly!
s0187.idiomatic: Appraisal: Confucius said, 'These people are the reason the Three Dynasties followed the straight path'â€”how true!

s0188.literal: Zhou and Qin became debilitated, the net was dense and the writing severe, yet evil tracks could not be overcome.
s0188.idiomatic: The Zhou and Qin dynasties became debilitated; their nets were dense and their laws severe, yet evil practices could not be contained.

s0189.literal: Han arose, swept away the vexatious harshness, and gave the people rest.
s0189.idiomatic: The Han dynasty arose, swept away the vexatious harshness, and allowed the people to rest.
